short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to improve your AMS experience. Automatically put your course schedule on your google calendar!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension to add more features that improve your AMS experience.

Current features:
 - Add your course timetable to any google calendar with a simple click!
